mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.spu_name spuName, a.spu_description spuDescription, a.category_id categoryId, c.`name` categoryName , a.brand_id brandId, d.`name` brandName, d.image brandImage, a.update_time updateTime, b.img_url imgUrl, e.price FROM tb_spu_info a left join (select * from tb_spu_images where default_img = 1) b on a.id = b.spu_id left join tb_category c on a.category_id = c.id left join tb_brand d on a.brand_id = d.id left join ( select spu_id, min(price) price from tb_sku_info GROUP BY spu_id ) e on a.id = e.spu_id WHERE a.id = #{spuId}

SELECT a.id, a.spu_name spuName, a.spu_description spuDescription, a.category_id categoryId, c.`name` categoryName , a.brand_id brandId, d.`name` brandName, d.image brandImage, a.update_time updateTime, b.img_url imgUrl, e.price FROM tb_spu_info a left join (select * from tb_spu_images where default_img = 1) b on a.id = b.spu_id left join tb_category c on a.category_id = c.id left join tb_brand d on a.brand_id = d.id left join ( select spu_id, min(price) price from tb_sku_info GROUP BY spu_id ) e on a.id = e.spu_id WHERE a.publish_status = 1
